tasks.task: Building and maintaining a water system for irrigation and power generation.
subtasks: Designing the water system considering elevation changes.
Installing a spring-fed water source at a lower elevation.
Propelling water uphill to store it at a higher elevation using gravity feed.
Exploring the possibility of a small hydroelectric plant utilizing the stored water.
Generating electricity at night by pumping water uphill and generating power as it flows downhill.
Ensuring consistent power supply by preventing over-reliance on generators.
Expanding irrigation reach to further areas as needed.
Assessing the capacity to increase the animal population.
Planning and executing the growth of the livestock herd.

tasks.task: Building and maintaining a water system for irrigation and power generation.
Building and maintaining a water system for irrigation and power generation.
Irrigating pastures using the gravity-fed system.
